name: Tarkin's Orders (V)
Text: 'USED: If a battle just initiated at a site, target your Imperial of ability = 3 defending. Target''s forfeit cannot be reduced, and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.LOST: Use 1 Force to deploy (or retrieve) Eriadu or an Imperial of ability = 3 (except Veers) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.)',
